citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on
24-JUL-17.
Inspector made contact with the Licensee at the facility. However; the Licensee was not available for inspection
due to a other obligations. According to the Licensee, these obligations were not at the facility or able to be
rescheduled.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on
24-JUL-17.
Inspector made contact with the Licensee at the facility.  However; the Licensee was not available for inspection
due to a other obligations. According to the Licensee, these obligations were not at the facility or able to be
rescheduled.
